DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Manufacturer Evaluation Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of a medical device._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of a medical device._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Medical device - any machinery designed to aid diagnostic and medical therapies. Medical device has to be designed with rigorous safety standards. There are several basic types of medical devices: life support equipment used to maintain a patient's body functions; therapeutic equipment; monitors and detectors to measure the indexes of a patient's state; imagine machines and laboratory equipment used with diagnostic and status monitoring purposes. In insurance parlance, the term is usually synonymous with assistive device, although it may include medical supplies.

Concepts.definition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.:Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Concepts.definition: A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable
